Effective Date: June 24, 2023  
  
This Privacy Policy governs the manner in which NextJob.Today ("we," "us," or
"our") collects, uses, maintains, and discloses information collected from
users (referred to as "you" or "your") of the NextJob.Today website
("Website").

## Information we collect

We may collect personal and non-personal information from you in various ways
when you interact with our Website.

This information may include, but is not
limited to:  
  
**Personal information:**  
\- Your name  
\- Contact information (such as email address and phone number)  
\- Resume or CV details  
\- Employment history and qualifications  
\- Any other information you voluntarily provide through our forms or
correspondence  
  
**Non-personal information:**  
\- Technical information about your device, browser, and operating system  
\- Internet Protocol (IP) address  
\- Website usage details (e.g., pages visited, time spent on each page)  
\- Cookies and similar technologies (see Section 4 for more details)  
  

## How we use collected information

We collect and use your information for the following purposes:  
  
**To provide and personalize our services:**  
\- To process and respond to your inquiries, applications, or job-related
requests  
\- To match you with suitable job opportunities based on your qualifications  
\- To communicate with you about job opportunities, updates, and promotions  
\- To improve our services and tailor them to your preferences  
  
**To improve our Website:**  
\- To analyze usage patterns and trends  
\- To monitor the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns  
\- To diagnose technical issues and ensure proper functionality  
  

## How we protect your information

We adopt appropriate data collection, storage, and processing practices, as
well as security measures, to protect against unauthorized access, alteration,
disclosure, or destruction of your personal information, username, password,
transaction information, and data stored on our Website.

## Sharing your personal information

We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties.

However, we may share your information with trusted third-party service
providers who assist us in operating our Website and conducting our business,
such as hosting providers, analytics providers, and communication tools.
